import React, {useContext} from 'react' import styles from'./Checkout.module.css' import CartContext from '../store/CartContext' import CheckoutItem from './CheckoutItem' import Backdrop from '../UI/Backdrop/Backdrop' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faClose, faCartShopping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import bagIcon from '../assets/bag.png' export default function Checkout(props) { const cartdata = useContext(CartContext) return (
Cart
{cartdata.cartItems.map(item => )}
Total ¥ {cartdata.sumPrice}
) }
